cost.question: How much does a website cost?
cost.answer: The price of a website depends on its complexity. Simple business card websites start from €1,200, corporate websites with CMS from €2,500, and advanced online stores from €6,500. We quote each project individually after understanding your needs.

timeline.question: How long does project implementation take?
timeline.answer: Implementation time depends on project complexity. A simple business card website takes 1-2 weeks, a corporate website with CMS takes 2-3 weeks, and an online store can take 4-8 weeks. We always set a specific schedule at the beginning of cooperation.

support.question: Do you offer post-implementation support?
support.answer: Yes! After implementation, we offer free technical support for 30 days. Then you can use our service packages including updates, backup, monitoring and quick help in case of problems.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: We specialize in modern technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js. For stores, we use headless eCommerce (Shopify, WooCommerce). All websites are fast, secure and SEO-optimized.

cms.question: Can I manage the content on the website myself?
cms.answer: Of course! All our websites are equipped with an intuitive admin panel (CMS) that allows you to easily edit texts, images and add new pages. We also provide training on how to use it.

responsive.question: Will the website be responsive on mobile devices?
responsive.answer: Yes, all our websites are fully responsive and work great on smartphones, tablets and computers. We design using the mobile-first method, which ensures the best experience on every device.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when visiting websites. They are used to remember preferences, facilitate website use, and collect analytical data.

essential.title: Essential
essential.description: Required for proper website functionality. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytical
analytics.description: Help understand how users interact with the website.

section3.title: 3. Managing Cookies
items: Browser settings - most browsers allow blocking or deleting cookies
Cookie banner - on first visit, you can choose accepted categories
Website settings - some preferences can be changed in settings

section4.title: 4. Impact of Disabling Cookies
section4.text: Disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality. Specifically:
items: The website may not remember your language preferences

The contact form may require additional verification
